
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(library-query-base)
target_compile_options(library-query-base PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(library-query-base PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base
)
target_link_libraries(library-query-base PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-yt-core
  yt-yt-client
  library-query-misc
  library-query-proto
)
target_sources(library-query-base PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/ast.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/coordination_helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/functions.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/builtin_function_registry.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/builtin_function_types.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/functions_common.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/key_trie.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/public.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/query.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/query_common.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/query_helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/query_preparer.cpp
)
target_bison_parser(library-query-base
  PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/parser.ypp
)
target_ragel_lexers(library-query-base
  PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/library/query/base/lexer.rl6
  -CG2
)
